name: Littlest Pet Shop: Friends
description: The 2nd edition of the LITTLEST PET SHOP video game brings the party to you with a new quirky pets and their best friends. Venture on quests, deliver invitations, serve up ice cream, and style your pets as you get ready for the biggest LITTLEST PET SHOP party of the year. Plus you can share the experience with your BFF with the all-new co-op play.
